errors.password_length: Password must be at least 8 characters

home.title: Welcome to Our React App!
home.subtitle: This is a sample homepage of our multi-page React application.

features.title: Discover Amazing Features
features.description: Our application demonstrates modern React functionalities such as routing, state management with Redux, TypeScript integration, and styling with Tailwind CSS. Explore our Todo page to see how tasks can be managed and get a feel for our clean design.

cta.title: Get Started
cta.description: Navigate to our Todo page to manage your tasks, or learn more about us by visiting the About page. Enjoy exploring and have a great experience!

header.title: About Us
header.subtitle: Learn more about our application and our team.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We strive to create innovative solutions that empower businesses and inspire change. Our team is dedicated to excellence and continuous improvement. With cutting-edge technology and a passion for creativity, we deliver products that make a difference.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded by a group of visionary engineers and designers, our journey began with a small idea that quickly blossomed into a full-fledged company. Our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction has set us apart in the competitive tech landscape. We are proud of our achievements and excited about what the future holds.
story.additional: Whether you are a potential collaborator or simply curious about our work, we invite you to explore our projects and get in touch. Your feedback and ideas are always welcome.

cta.heading: Get the latest news!
cta.description: Stay updated with our newest content, features and offers. Join our newsletter today!

footer.copyright: Â© 2022. Company Name. All rights reserved.
